remarks: A variation on ~ atanlogadd , to show that ` sqrt ( 1 + _i z ) / sqrt ( 1 - _i z ) = ` ` sqrt ( ( 1 + _i z ) / ( 1 - _i z ) ) ` under more limited conditions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Apr-2015.)
statement: atanlogsub $p |- ( ( A e. dom arctan /\ ( Re ` A ) =/= 0 ) -> ( ( log ` ( 1 + ( _i x. A ) ) ) - ( log ` ( 1 - ( _i x. A ) ) ) ) e. ran log ) $.
